metadata.Name: Alloprof
metadata.Description: A French question-answer dataset for the educational domain. It contains over 6,000 pairs curated by the Alloprof organization, covering subjects like math, French, and science. The data comes from a homework help service.
metadata.Paper Title: Alloprof: a new French question-answer education dataset and its use in an information retrieval case study
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the 4th Workshop on Research in Computational Linguistic Typology and Multilingual NLP
metadata.Venue Name: 4th Workshop on Research in Computational Linguistic Typology and Multilingual NLP (SIGTYP 2022)
metadata.Abstract: This paper introduces Alloprof, a new French question-answer dataset in the education domain. The dataset was curated by Alloprof, a Quebec-based organization that offers homework help services to students. It contains over 6,000 question-answer pairs, covering a wide range of subjects, such as mathematics, French, and science. We describe the dataset creation process and provide a baseline for an information retrieval task. We also show that a model pre-trained on this dataset can be used for transfer learning on other French question-answering datasets. The dataset is publicly available on the Hugging Face Hub.
